description:
Postcards from Anhedonia: The Video Game

Join intrepid heroes Charlotte Light and Dark aboard the spaceship Gesmer on an epic space adventure!

  • Travel the galaxy on a quest to find the source of the mysterious destructive giant body parts plaguing planet Earth!
  • Battle waves of cunning enemies, including the dreaded Mister Lizard fleet!
  • Encounter amazing reality-warping space anomalies that will cause you to question your very sanity!

Special guest stars Mister Lizard.

Inspired by true events.

Note: game not optimised for phones, play it on a proper computer.
